about_the_game:
Unveil Hidden Wonders in a Masterpiece: Embark on the Art Detective Journey with The Prosperous Gusu Scroll!

Step into the latest chapter of Art Detective, an enthralling blend of art exploration and puzzle-solving. This time, the spotlight shines on a timeless masterpiece — The Prosperous Gusu Scroll. A brilliant gem of Chinese art history, this Ming Dynasty treasure captures the vibrant cityscape of ancient Suzhou with intricate details and vivid storytelling.

What is The Prosperous Gusu Scroll?

The Prosperous Gusu Scroll is one of the most iconic works by Qing Dynasty artist Xu Yang. This handscroll portrays Suzhou as the bustling economic and cultural hub of its time. From serene countryside landscapes to lively urban markets, the painting unfolds multiple scenes, showcasing workshops, tea houses, bridges, and riverboats in a seamless narrative. This detailed scroll, housed in the Liaoning Provincial Museum, it encapsulates not only the busy lives of its citizens but also the harmony of natural beauty and cultural elements, presenting Suzhou as a city teeming with life.

  • A Unique Perspective: The scroll’s exquisite brushwork captures the dynamics of the city, immersing viewers as though they are walking its streets.

  • Rich Details: Every corner tells a story—pedestrians on bridges, boats navigating the canals, and merchants bustling in the marketplace.

  • Cultural Significance: As both an artistic masterpiece and a historical document, the scroll offers invaluable insight into Ming Dynasty society.

Game Highlights

  • Immersive Interactive Experience
    Dive deep into the scroll, exploring its vibrant scenes and uncovering secrets hidden in the heart of a thriving ancient city.

  • Art Meets Puzzle Solving
    Search for over 400 hidden objects within the intricately detailed painting, blending art appreciation with challenging gameplay.

  • Stress-Free Gameplay
    Enjoy the journey at your own pace, discovering the mysteries of The Prosperous Gusu Scroll in a relaxed and engaging way.
